column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We had a bottle of red
column2: which went well with the steak
column3: but felt a bit overpriced for what it was. I later learned they allow you to bring your own wine
column4: so that might be a better idea for next time! On the other hand
column5: the cocktails we had were absolutely delicious. Try the mint julep if you're into that kind of thing. You won't be disappointed.
